item.title: England / The Britannia Coco-nut Dancers of Bacup
item.description:
England / The Britannia Coco-nut Dancers of Bacup

The Nutters perform at the Saddleworth Rushcart Weekend,23 August 2009,outside St Chads Church in Uppermill.

item.title: Japan / Yoshida Brothers "KODO" 吉田兄弟「鼓動」
item.description:
Japan / Yoshida Brothers "KODO" 吉田兄弟「鼓動」

Buy this album: http://www.domomusicgroup.com/yoshidabrothers/albums/hishou.php Buy at iTunes (Kodo - Hishou Version): http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/kodo-hishou-version-hishou/id212368097?i=212368266?at=11lMDe Yoshida Brothers website http://www.domomusicgroup.com/yoshidabrothers/index.php Music video of Kodo by Yoshida Brothers. Yoshida Brothers song "Kodo" is the theme song for Nintendo's Wii game console. Check out the video! The Song is in include album "Yoshida Brothers II" It was released from Domo Music Group.

item.title: Sweden / First Aid Kit - Tiger Mountain Peasant Song (Cover)
item.description:
Sweden / First Aid Kit - Tiger Mountain Peasant Song (Cover)

We're First Aid Kit and we're a sisters-duo from Sweden. In the summer of 2008 we did this cover of "Tiger Mountain Peasant Song" by Fleet Foxes. http://www.thisisfirstaidkit.com http://www.facebook.com/firstaidkitofficial http://www.myspace.com/thisisfirstaidkit We went out in the forest this morning and recorded this cover of the wonderful song "Tiger Mountain Peasant Song" by Fleet Foxes, our favourite band right now.
